house_listing.house_description: This 1 level single family home built in 1981 has 3 bedroom(s), 4 bath(s) and approximately 3520 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Southw Coldwell Banker Success Southw

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Den, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
